citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 pm on
20-Sep-18.
No one was home so a phone call was made to the son of the licensee . He stated she was out of town and he was
not available to accompany me on the inspection.
